jobs.title: C++ Systems Engineer
jobs.description: Build high-performance services and libraries in modern C++.
jobs.fullDescription: You will design and implement low-latency systems in C++ for our core platform. The role focuses on performance profiling, memory management, and stability across Linux environments. Experience with multithreaded systems and production debugging is required.

jobs.title: Python Data Engineer
jobs.description: Develop data pipelines and automation using Python.
jobs.fullDescription: You will build and maintain data pipelines, validate datasets, and automate reporting. Strong Python skills and a focus on data quality are essential for this role.

jobs.title: Modeling and Simulation Engineer
jobs.description: Create simulation models for control systems using Simulink.
jobs.fullDescription: You will build Simulink models for control algorithms and integrate them with C++ components. The role includes model validation, test harness development, and collaboration with embedded teams.

jobs.title: Full Stack React Developer
jobs.description: Deliver user-facing features in React with Python-powered APIs.
jobs.fullDescription: You will build responsive React interfaces and contribute to Python services that power the UI. The position requires experience with modern JavaScript tooling, REST APIs, and component-driven design.

jobs.title: Autonomous Systems Developer
jobs.description: Develop autonomy software that blends simulation, perception, and control.
jobs.fullDescription: You will design autonomy software across simulation, perception, and planning. The role spans C++ and Python development, integrates Simulink models, and coordinates with UI teams building React tooling for ops dashboards.

jobs.title: C++ Build Tools Engineer
jobs.description: Maintain build systems and tooling for large C++ codebases.
jobs.fullDescription: You will improve build performance, manage toolchains, and maintain CI pipelines for C++ projects. Experience with CMake and automated testing workflows is required.

jobs.title: Python Automation Engineer
jobs.description: Automate workflows and infrastructure tasks with Python.
jobs.fullDescription: You will develop automation scripts, integrate tooling, and support deployment workflows. The role focuses on reliable automation and clear documentation.
